import React,{useState,useRef,useLayoutEffect}from"react";import*as pdfjs from"pdfjs-dist";import{useSession}from"./SessionContext";// Import the session context hook
// Set the worker source for pdf.js
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";pdfjs.GlobalWorkerOptions.workerSrc="/pdf.worker.mjs";// Host worker in public/
const fabric=require("fabric").fabric;// Proper ES module import for Fabric.js
const DocumentCanvas=()=>{const{sessionId,documentUrl}=useSession();// Access session data
const canvasRef=useRef(null);const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState(1);const[totalPages,setTotalPages]=useState(0);useLayoutEffect(()=>{console.log("Initializing the canvas...");if(!canvasRef.current){console.warn("Canvas reference is not ready yet.");return;}let canvasInstance;try{// Initialize Fabric.js canvas
canvasInstance=new fabric.Canvas(canvasRef.current,{width:800,height:600});console.log("Fabric.js canvas initialized.");}catch(error){console.error("Error initializing Fabric.js:",error);return;// Exit early if initialization fails
}// Function to render PDF to Fabric.js canvas
const renderPDFToCanvas=async pageNumber=>{if(!documentUrl){console.warn("No document URL provided.");return;}try{const pdf=await pdfjs.getDocument(documentUrl).promise;// Load PDF
setTotalPages(pdf.numPages);// Set total page count
const page=await pdf.getPage(pageNumber);// Get specific page
const viewport=page.getViewport({scale:1.5});// Create a separate canvas for PDF rendering
const pdfCanvas=document.createElement("canvas");pdfCanvas.width=viewport.width;pdfCanvas.height=viewport.height;const context=pdfCanvas.getContext("2d");await page.render({canvasContext:context,viewport}).promise;// Set PDF as Fabric.js background image
fabric.Image.fromURL(pdfCanvas.toDataURL(),oImg=>{canvasInstance.setBackgroundImage(oImg,canvasInstance.renderAll.bind(canvasInstance));console.log(`PDF page ${pageNumber} rendered as background.`);});}catch(error){console.error("Error rendering PDF:",error);}};renderPDFToCanvas(currentPage);// Render initial page
return()=>{console.log("Cleaning up Fabric.js canvas...");canvasInstance.dispose();};},[currentPage,documentUrl]);// Dependencies
// Handlers for navigating pages
const goToNextPage=()=>{if(currentPage<totalPages)setCurrentPage(prevPage=>prevPage+1);};const goToPreviousPage=()=>{if(currentPage>1)setCurrentPage(prevPage=>prevPage-1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:canvasRef}),!documentUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:"No document URL provided. Please check the session."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:"10px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goToPreviousPage,disabled:currentPage===1,children:"Previous Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goToNextPage,disabled:currentPage===totalPages||totalPages===0,children:"Next Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Page ",currentPage," of ",totalPages]})]})]});};export default DocumentCanvas;
